entry.title: Mathjax
entry.content:
testing mathjax \[ F(\omega) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty f(t) e^{-i \omega t} \d t. \]

\[ C_p (M)=\underbrace{\frac{SS_{res}(M)}{n}}_{\textrm{goodness of fit}} + \underbrace{\frac{2 \sigma^2 p_M}{n}}_{\textrm{complexity}} \normal \]
